model.name: Model for chlorzoxazone elimination in the liver

notes.body:
Model for chlorzoxazone elimination in the liver
Model for hepatic metabolism of chlorzoxazone via CYP2E1 in in SBML.
Terms of use
The content of this model has been carefully created in a manual research effort. This file has been created by Matthias König using sbmlutils. For questions contact koenigmx@hu-berlin.de. Copyright © 2023 Matthias König.

parameter.name: rate constant for czx import into liver
factor that scales import rate constant such that target equilibrium concentrationequals Tissue-Plasma ratio (T/P). Reported in rats: 0.627 +-0.0618 {Kim2002}
scaling factor to rach target equilibrium tissue-plasma ratio (T/P)reported T/P in rats (0.221 +- 0.0092) {Kim et al.}
scaling factor to rach target equilibrium tissue-plasma ratio (T/P)
mm constant for glucuronidation of czx6oh (Quesnot2018) by UGT1A9, UGT1A6, UGT1A1
scaling parameter of O-Glucuronidation activity for parameter scans
rate constant for czx import into liver

body.p: Rates of alcohol elimination 8.5 g/hr/70kg (Holford1987) 0.121 g/hr/kg | :46.07 g/mole 2.626e-3 mole/hr/kg | 1hr = 60 min 4.376e-5 mole/min/kg | 1 mole = 1000 mmole 4.376e-2 mmole/min/kg
FIXME: add reference for the value

parameter.name: rate constant for CYP2E1 mRNA degradation

body.p: half life of cyp2e1 is reported to be 6 hrs (Roberts1995).Calculated by kd = ln(2)/t_half
production rate = degradation rate at baseline resulting in cyp2e1 = 1.0 dimensionless
Ethanol elimination via alcohol dehydrogenase in the liver. Due to saturation of enzyme (ethanol > ETHEL_KM) constant rate of ethanol elimination.
Ethanol stabilizes CYP2E1, i.e., the degradation rate is reduced.
